issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I ran just the jmx test suite as follows and got 4 timeout errors:
java junit.textui.TestRunner \
org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.management._Suite \
>>test.out 2>&1

.F.F.F..........F
Time: 1,205.25
There were 4 failures:
1) JMXTest:clientjunit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Timed out waiting for net
work server to start
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.NetworkServerTestSetup.waitForServerStart(N
etworkServerTestSetup.java:440)
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.NetworkServerTestSetup.setUp(NetworkServerT
estSetup.java:173)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:18)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestSetup.run(BaseTestSetup.java:57)
    at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:22)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:19)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
    at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:22)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:19)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
2) ManagementMBeanTest:clientjunit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Timed out wai
ting for network server to start
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.NetworkServerTestSetup.waitForServerStart(N
etworkServerTestSetup.java:440)
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.NetworkServerTestSetup.setUp(NetworkServerT
estSetup.java:173)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:18)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestSetup.run(BaseTestSetup.java:57)
    at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:22)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:19)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
    at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:22)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:19)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
3) InactiveManagementMBeanTest:clientjunit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Timed
 out waiting for network server to start
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.NetworkServerTestSetup.waitForServerStart(N
etworkServerTestSetup.java:440)
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.NetworkServerTestSetup.setUp(NetworkServerT
estSetup.java:173)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:18)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestSetup.run(BaseTestSetup.java:57)
    at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:22)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:19)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
    at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:22)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:19)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
4) VersionMBeanTest:clientjunit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Timed out waitin
g for network server to start
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.NetworkServerTestSetup.waitForServerStart(N
etworkServerTestSetup.java:440)
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.NetworkServerTestSetup.setUp(NetworkServerT
estSetup.java:173)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:18)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
    at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestSetup.run(BaseTestSetup.java:57)
    at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:22)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:19)
    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)
    at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:22)

    at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:23)

FAILURES!!!
Tests run: 13,  Failures: 4,  Errors: 0
fields.summary: getting "Timed out waiting for network server to start" errors while running JMX unit tests
fields.environment: windows XP, dual core laptop, ibm5 jvm, running against sane/debug classes updated to  634360 (around 3/6/08 9am PST)

comments.body: I saw same behavior on a different machine on a different high speed network - against a build version from sometime on 3/5/08).  That machine is faster, has 4 cores running XP.  It also was a sane,debug build running against classes.  In that run it came as part of running the full nightly test suite.
If anyone else is seeing this, could you post a comment along with your environment info.  I suspect it is some sort of environment/timing issue.

Turns out it is a classes vs. jars issue.

With classes the server fails to start up because when setting up the environment for the security policy file it cannot find derbynet.jar in the classpath.

This was obvious once I fixed the decorator to keep the output from the spawned network server.

This is a known issue, other tests work-around it using TestConfiguration.loadingFromJars()  but the crucial information was not added to the javadoc comments for the NetworkServerTestSetup constructor that results in a spawned server.
